summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 74W, page 175, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Brighton Orchard Add., Lots 1 to 6 incl. Block 3, Lots 1 and 2 and North 1/2 of Lot 3, Block 4; and Lots 1 and 2, and North 1/2 of Lot 3, Block 10, Brighton Beach Orchard Add. 2nd Plat, as General Commercial (CG) Zone, located on the east side of Rainier Ave. between Orchard St. and the midblock line south of Garden St.
